name: Dungeon Builder (Tamatsu, Ashgan, DerJaeger, PitzonXD)
description:
Build a dungeon for the hero and ensure that he can destroy the end boss. Made in 8 hours for the Berlin Mini Game Jam, January 2023!

Check out our design draft here!

Please note that this game is UNFINISHED and UNPOLISHED.

How to play
  • Use mouse and left click to place rooms
  • Move camera with W A S D & scroll with the mouse wheel
  • Connect the start (left room) with the end (right room)
  • Exit game with Escape or Alt + F4
Credits
  • Programming - Ashgan, PitsonXD
  • Game Design - Ashgan
  • 3D - DerJaeger
  • 2D - Tamatsu
